WRITING.TITLE: Reading Kin no Kanojo Gin no Kanojo
WRITING.TEXT: Already on chapter 28, too bad there are only 30 so far ;_; I really love the plot and the humor in this one! Could be a bit more ecchi maybe hehe I've read some criticism about it not being original on some website. But if you ask me, that's nonsense. While it's true that the beginning of the story isn't innovative, the manga itself has it's own character with some nice cliches and classical additions imo! I'm enjoying it a lot so far and can recommend it!
Sounds interesting, I want to know now too ^^
FAKE NEWZZZZZ
Ahh, thanks man I'll try locking the fps then!
Edit: no need anymore Damn, I have the same issue Could you find a solution to fix it?

WRITING.TITLE: BotW 1.4 no Text on Map
WRITING.TEXT: I'm playing version 1.4 on Cemu 1.11.2 and I've noticed that my map only shows the shiekah hyroglyphes but not the latin letters. Exactly like in this post here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Breath_of_the_Wild/comments/7lutp9/confused_on_world_map/ However I think it's an issue related to the Emulator not the game. Restarting couldn't fix it and trying different settings either yet. Do anyone know how to fix this?
Thanks man and sorry to hear that!
You're absolutely right, I do! Thank you very much I'll try that! :)
You also got a performance boost? Looking to try out this version but I rather just overwrite my current files like you did instead of setting all up from scratch again^^

WRITING.TITLE: Editing armor and their bonuses
WRITING.TEXT: Hey, I'd like to ask/suggest for a feature! It would be awesome to edit the effects of armors, like for example enabling stealth on the Nintendo shirt or whatever you like I like the new outfits which came with the dlc's unfortunately some of them aren't upgradeable by the fairies and some doesn't even have any effects at all. So, is this even possible?
If you're playing on Cemu, you just have to turn off the clear rune graphics pack. That did the trick for me. Otherwise you probably have to contact the Nintendo customer support.
Ahhhh we do feel the same way!! Where's that one Jap/Eng guy to safe us
Tactical dot .
Thanks! Glad to have found the stuff from the3829 ! :)
it keeps me up at night...
exactly what I want to do!

Yes, I know about that! You know I've beaten Ganon already and did every quest, now I want to "clean" the map from all the monsters left \^\^ So it's really just for fun, I don't care at this point anymore if the game progress gets corrupted by stopping the blood moon
waiting for a download link
Found all the downloads in that directory as well. Weird that they Brave is putting them in there, but apparently only on my OP7TPro. It didn't happen on my OnePlus 6 (also with Android 10) though.

WRITING.TITLE: Design after Computer Science BSc?
WRITING.TEXT: So I'm currently at the finish line of my Bachelor's degree in computer science and looking for a university in Europe, preferably Germany, to make my Master degree. I'm now experienced with DevOps, automation, embedded systems and a few other CS stuff. However I realized that I might should rather try something that appeals more to me than CS. Which is Design. I've spent a year working as a UX/UI designer and spent lots of free time with Photoshop on digital graphics. What I now would like to do is finding a Master's degree where I can combine my CS skills and background with my appeal and talent for design. Is there a suiting combination for such a Master?
Thank you! Are you studying in that field yourself? How "creative" does it get in terms of sketching, modeling or doing mockups maybe?
Thanks a lot!
What else you going to use if not Ali?
It kind of feels generic. And the actual designs doesn't speak to me at all tbh. What's your drive? Why would I buy from YOU?
Everyone is worried that you could steal "their" product and bother their sales. That's obvious. But asking doesn't hurt imo, it's just that you eventually won't get a reply.
Like wtf, I thought the same people are trash literally
Interested in that as well. But import to Germany.
you're doing gods work
try another browser maybe, the link definitely works!
can you please put the answer here again, the user got the deletet
It looks so shiny on the photos. Wish there was a matte case mod. Still pretty cool!

WRITING.TITLE: Apple Pen Angle Adjustment
WRITING.TEXT: Hi,I've been using the iPad Pro with the Pen for a while now and lately I'm trying to replicate the sketching on paper style that I enjoy a lot with paper and pen. With a bit of tweaking, using layers, transparancy and practice it works out quite well. However, I'm stumbling across the issue that the pen just decides to go into that "sanding" mode whenever I hit the wrong angle. Please see the image below to get the idea. [![IMG](https://i.imgur.com/Kwx6dET.jpg)] [https://imgur.com/a/3m9kjQH](https://imgur.com/a/3m9kjQH) #8203; #8203; I have no idea what exactly to adjust to ged rid of it, so if anyone knows what to do, please share your proposals!Thanks!

yeah I tried that! Tried the 0 #176;, tried the 90 #176;. It's honestly didn't change much, I still get that "sanding". It rather changes the outcome of the sanding/gradient (if you can call it like that). I mean it's a cool effect for sure, but it just happens accidentally for me which is pretty annoying.

how much does the hosting costs, using all the services mentioned? Is it worth the time and effort to set it up financially, like hosting sites for business clients and getting away cheaper than with any other webhosting service, or is it rather a DIY just for fun thing?
I'll take a look, thanks!
Cool, that's a number to consider haha Nice!
Tactical dot .
